hero.headline: Say hello to Noir, your new beauty directive.

review.content: With Noir, I found an incredible lash tech who fitted on a beauitful set of lashes on me and it really improved my confidence! I told all my friends about her and we all use her regularly now. I would'nt have been able to find her if it weren't for Noir

opt.headline: Have a business you want featured on the Noir Directive?
